name: Blockitect
description:
Blockitect is a Minecraft-like game where you can build anything you can imagine.

Modifying the size and rotation of the block increases the possibilities of making different structures.

Features:

  • Randomly generated worlds
  • Rotate/Scale blocks
  • Multiplayer
  • Save/Load
  • Customized world settings
  • Unlimited build height
  • Amazing music

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Select Block: E
  • Edit Block: Q
  • Fill: F
  • Chat: C
